text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ha-ha-ha! I never thought I'd get injured, 
being so brilliantly cautious!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It seems it's possible that my Bakushin is 
not in tune with the physical laws of Earth, 
or something to that effect!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hear me, Earth!! Next time, you shall follow 
my lead!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
…Alright! Now that's done! Let us resume 
training straightaway!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Don't you worry, I'm an honors student! 
Every single cell in my body is filled to the 
brim with excellence, so I'll heal in no time 
flat!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Don't you worry, I'm an honors student! 
Every single cell in my body is filled to the 
brim with excellence, so I'll heal in no time 
flat!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No!? This is completely unreasonable! 
Even though the Earth and I are both 
willing to go through with it!?

……She seemed pretty dissatisfied, but 
somehow I managed to talk her into taking 
a break.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Affirmative! 
Then without further delay, let's get going!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
H, huh―!? Why in the world is it hurting 
more than before!?

Her injury was exacerbated by her 
frolicking about, and she was forced…… 
to focus on healing up.

Sakura Bakushin O is running briskly 
down the training track.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Whoo-hoo-hoo! That's perfect! The earth 
seems to have reflected well on the matter.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This is the power of honors leadership! It's 
resilience!

As per her mysterious theory, she showed 
amazing recovery… and was able to 
resume her training right away!
